snippet: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission director said it needs to rewrite its standards to address what it considers “high consequence” events in view of last year’s nuclear accident in Japan.
abstract: Nuclear Regulatory Commission director Gregory B Jaczko says it needs to rewrite its standards to address what it considers 'high consequence' events in view of the 2011 nuclear accident at the Fukushima Daiichi plant in Japan.
lead_paragraph: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission director said it needs to rewrite its standards to address what it considers “high consequence” events in view of last year’s nuclear accident in Japan.

headline.seo: Nuclear Agency Head Calls For New Standards
headline.main: Nuclear Agency Head Calls for New Standards
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Agency Head Calls For New Standards
